item.title: Automated screenshots in Flutter (without pain)
item.description: For me, screenshots of apps was always a painful theme. I think we’ve all been there: You find an absolutely perfect tool, it’s simple and minimalistic (judging by screenshots from its website). You download it, open it, and it looks completely different. It’s a little bit disappointing.
